item.title: 📝 pom-io/pom-component (19 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: pom-io

📝 Repository: pom-io/pom-component

📄 Descrizione: This gem provides a base component class and helper utilities for building ViewComponents in Rails applications, with built-in Tailwind CSS support. It includes advanced features such as option management, style composition, and Stimulus.js integration
